game.name: Under the Banner
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In Under the Banner, you don’t lead a single hero, you lead a guild. You prepare adventurers for their quests, balance your resources, and decide their fate. Care for your adventurers’ happiness and needs. The stories written under your banner shape both their legacy and yours.
